description.fr: Porter à ébullition, réduire le feu et couvrir pour laisser cuire 15-20 minutes
description.en: Bring to boil, reduce heat and cover to cook for 15-20 minutes
description.ko: 끓인 후 불을 줄이고 뚜껑을 덮어 15-20분간 요리하세요

tips.fr:
Porter à ébullition
Réduire le feu et couvrir
Laisser cuire 15-20 minutes
tips.en:
Bring to boil
Reduce heat and cover
Let cook for 15-20 minutes
tips.ko:
끓이세요
불을 줄이고 뚜껑을 덮으세요
15-20분간 요리하세요
